text: Hanki Israeli vahe'mo'za Naftali naga'mofo mopafinti 3'a ranra kuma Gesomu naga'ma refko huzami'nazana, zamagu'ma vazinagu kore freno ome fraki rankuma Galili mopafi me'neana Kades ran kumaki, Hamot-Dori kumaki, Katan rankuma'ene, ana maka tava'ozamire'ma me'nea mopa, afu zamimo'zama tra'zama nesaza mopa zami'naze.
